name: Stupid Skull Twin
description:
A skull boy have been training for decades,  finally manage to make a clone of himself, but he is kind of  STUPID, there is no other option but collaborate with him in order to survive .

How to play

collect SKULLS to gain score and new powers, try to get highest score possible

 ARROW keys to MOVE

S to SHOOT

X to drop BOMB

D to drop BOMB using your STUPID CLONE

--------

SKULL POWERS:

H: Heal

F: Flash & Kill all enemies

S:  Spread Gun

P: Dark Cute Flies

C : Dark souls

M: Medium Speed Gun

MG : Machine Gun
